message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that can bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $800000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $800000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $800000.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer the product to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $980000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $800000.

I'm not willing to go as low as $980000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1050000. This is my final offer, considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.
